channel.title: Interactive on Ivan Carnevali
channel.description: Recent content in Interactive on Ivan Carnevali

item.title: Analysis of property prices in Portsmouth
item.description: Few variables of interest will be used in order to investigate, after fitting an appropriate model, how the sale price is influenced by different properties of the houses. The analysis and the results will be presented using a Shiny App and a Poster. Download the Poster. See the Shiny APP.
